name: David Fuller
title: Founder | Fractional CRO | GTM Advisor
tagline: Helping companies build predictable, scalable revenue growth
what_we_do: Portco Revenue Advisors provides fractional CRO and go-to-market advisory services for lower-to-mid-market companies. We align strategy, people, process, and execution around a clear North Star, so revenue becomes predictable and not dependent on heroics. We partner with leadership teams to lead turnarounds, support add-on growth, and scale high-growth organizations through disciplined planning, structure design, process optimization, and leadership development.
who_we_help: Business owners and CEOs of PE-backed companies ($10M–$50M in revenue) that are not comfortable with the predictability and growth of their revenue, not confident and prepared to scale their business profitably, or not satisfied with their company's value and/or positioned to accelerate their exit.
key_services: Sales process and operating model optimization
Due diligence and value-creation support for PE-backed companies
differentiator: Every Portco Revenue Advisors client has improved revenue performance. We work exclusively with owners and investors who are serious about transformational change and who want a repeatable system for growth, not short-term fixes.
notable_results_intro: Average improvement of Value Drivers for 27 companies

name: Dan Hogan
title: Vistage Chair & Executive Coach
tagline: Guiding executives and business owners towards their full potential
what_we_do: As a Vistage Chair, I facilitate confidential peer advisory groups for CEOs and business owners, providing executive coaching, strategic planning guidance, and access to the world's largest executive coaching organization. Through thought-provoking group meetings and personalized coaching sessions, I empower leaders to reach greater heights of success.
who_we_help: CEOs, executives, and business owners of small and midsize businesses ($1M-$1B revenue) who want to make better decisions, achieve better results, and become better leaders.
differentiator: As a former Vistage member turned Chair, I bring real-world business experience combined with deep expertise in leadership development and strategic planning.
notable_results: Vistage member companies outperform competitors and, on average, grow revenues at three times the percentage growth rate after joining.

name: Kyle Harrington
title: Business Consultant
tagline: Helping CEOs strengthen HR frameworks so they can refocus on growth
what_we_do: We provide complete, end-to-end HR solutions through our Professional Employer Organization (PEO) model. From payroll processing and tax preparation to benefits administration, risk management, and workers' compensation—we handle it all so you can focus on growing your business.
who_we_help: CEOs and business owners of small to medium-sized businesses who want to alleviate tactical HR burdens, navigate compliance confidently, and strengthen their HR infrastructure without building a full internal team.
differentiator: As the nation's fastest-growing PEO, Vensure combines industry-leading technology with personalized service to deliver world-class HR processes that free up your time to pursue your business vision.
notable_results: Helped thousands of businesses manage, nurture, and grow by providing scalable HR solutions that reduce administrative burden and mitigate compliance risk.

name: Ryan Castle
title: CEO
tagline: Transform your leaders, transform your business
what_we_do: We build leadership development systems that transform businesses by creating self-sufficient teams. Through practical online courses, focused 1:1 coaching, and peer learning groups, we give business owners the clarity, confidence, and space to grow, sell, or step back from their businesses.
who_we_help: Business owners, visionaries, and integrators running on EOS® or leading fast-growing teams who want to build real leadership capacity across their organization—not just train individuals.
differentiator: Leadership isn't learned in a workshop—it's built on the job, over time. With 30+ years of corporate and entrepreneurial experience, including managing $100M+ revenue and running my own IT business, I bring real-world tactics that get results.
notable_results: Coached hundreds of business owners, chaired multiple advisory boards, and led high-impact workshops that help leaders build teams capable of running the business independently.

name: Cade Beerman
title: Business Broker
tagline: Your business sale specialist—bringing buyers and sellers together
what_we_do: We help small and mid-sized companies navigate the complex waters of buying, selling, or growing through acquisition. From business valuation and marketing to finding qualified buyers and managing the entire transaction process, we handle it all with confidentiality and integrity.
who_we_help: Business owners looking to sell their company, entrepreneurs wanting to buy an existing business, and companies seeking growth through strategic acquisitions.
differentiator: As part of the #1 ranked Transworld franchise (7 consecutive years among 250+ global franchises), we bring extensive buyer and seller networks that result in expedited transactions and maximized results. Our team has completed $110M+ in transactions.
notable_results: Successfully sold businesses across multiple industries including restoration, commercial construction, and more—often achieving results where other brokers couldn't.

name: Zack DeLisa
title: Partner & CFO Advisor
tagline: Fractional CFO services that drive real financial results
what_we_do: We provide outsourced CFO, controller, and accounting services with an advisory-led, tech-forward approach. From bookkeeping and financial reporting to strategic planning and M&A advisory, we partner with leadership teams through all stages—from formation and capital raising through growth, M&A, and exit.
who_we_help: CEOs and leadership teams at startup and growth middle-market companies who need high-impact financial leadership without the cost of a full-time CFO.
differentiator: With nearly 25 years of finance and operations leadership at organizations large and small—including a 33% reduction in close cycle time and discovering $2M in unrecognized profit at previous roles—I know what 'great' looks like and can help you get there.
notable_results: Helped a book manufacturer increase plant capacity by 300% and reduce cycle time by 250% while serving as combined CFO/COO.

name: Jay Geiger
title: Owner
tagline: Your go-to technology advisors for safety, stability, and growth
what_we_do: We provide managed IT services for small to medium-sized businesses, including cybersecurity, cloud services, data backup and recovery, network management, and 24/7 system monitoring. We take the worry out of your technology so you can focus on growing your business.
who_we_help: Small to medium-sized businesses in the Denver metro area who need corporate-quality IT services without the overhead of an internal IT department.
differentiator: With an MBA from University of Chicago Booth and 30+ years of technology leadership experience—including managing $115M in professional services revenue—I bring corporate expertise to local businesses with responsive, community-focused service.
notable_results: Built lasting relationships with local businesses by providing proactive IT management that prevents problems before they impact operations.

name: Cade Dannels
title: Founder
tagline: Helping B2B businesses unlock AI and automation without the overwhelm
what_we_do: We help B2B service businesses unlock AI, automation, and smarter data strategies. We walk into your business, roll up our sleeves, and show you exactly where AI can help you right now—and what it takes to scale it later. From lead generation automation to connecting all your software systems, we make technology work for you.
who_we_help: B2B service business owners who feel the pressure to 'do something' with AI but aren't sure where to start, or if it's even relevant to them.
differentiator: Since 2020, we've helped businesses across industries make AI approachable and useful. We focus on practical solutions that save time, avoid bottlenecks, and let teams focus on what matters most—without adding overhead or complexity.
notable_results: Created lead generation automation systems that help clients reach more relevant leads faster, and connected software systems so 'things just happen like magic'—making small businesses feel like innovative tech companies.

name: Dan Mahoney
title: Vice President & Denver General Manager
tagline: Strategic communications that build brands and drive business results
what_we_do: We provide full-service PR and marketing services including strategic communications, integrated marketing, crisis management, M&A communications, and media relations. With 35+ years of experience, we help companies navigate complex communication challenges and enhance brand reputation.
who_we_help: Denver-area businesses and national brands in technology, cybersecurity, cleantech, energy, and professional services who need sophisticated strategic communications support.
differentiator: As a Colorado native with 18+ years at a nationally recognized strategic communications agency and deep connections across Denver, I bring local market insights combined with Fortune 500-level expertise to help businesses tell their stories effectively.
notable_results: Worked with Fortune 500 companies and innovative brands across technology, aerospace, cleantech, and professional services to build thought leadership and navigate high-profile communications challenges.

name: Ed Lee
title: Financial Planner
tagline: Helping individuals, families, and businesses achieve their financial goals
what_we_do: We develop custom financial and wealth strategies that cover everything from disability, life, and long-term care insurance to retirement planning, tax strategies, and estate preservation. We provide regular check-ups to ensure your plan evolves with your life.
who_we_help: Individuals, families, and small business owners who want a clear, customized plan for their financial success—covering tax savings, cash flow management, debt consolidation, real estate acquisition, and more.
differentiator: With a true passion for helping clients develop clear plans for financial success, I've been helping people since 2004. I also run a mentor program for kids ages 6-12 in foster care—because giving back is close to my heart.
notable_results: Helped clients across the Denver metro area achieve their short and long-term financial goals through comprehensive planning that looks at the whole picture, not just investments.
